ai-tha-ap178:1.2_0: the Lord of Men, the Lord of Men,
ai-tha-ap178:1.3_0: For the welfare and happiness of the present life
ai-tha-ap178:2.1_0: the hairs growing in my feet,
ai-tha-ap178:2.4_0: I paid homage to the Buddha
ai-tha-ap178:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saviṭṭha.
ai-tha-ap178:6.1_0: Seeing the sixth Elder Nun Sikhī
